sentence.Network_en: This argument and the awful weight of the hour quelled the wouldbe heresy - hunters.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一论点,以及当时的严重局势,制止了那些所谓的迫害异端的人们.

sentence.Network_en: That wouldbe a huge loss and we think this is our right.
sentence.Network_cn: 那将会是一个巨大的损失.

sentence.Network_en: The signs say it wouldbe lucky to use myMonopoly card now.
sentence.Network_cn: 号讯说它会是幸运使用我的垅断现在的卡.

PerfectNetExp.abs: would 选本, wouldbe 将是, would 高技术
He was not married , he said and wouldbe ., 他没有结婚 , 他说 , 以后也不会.
no , that wouldbe too cruel ., 不去也太无情了点.

entry.def: You can use would-be to describe someone who wants or attempts to do a particular thing. For example, a would-be writer is someone who wants to be a writer.

example.ex: ...a book that provides encouragement for would-be writers who cannot get their novel into print.
example.tran: 一本勉励想成为作家却不能将小说付梓者的书

auth_sentence.content: There was also the interception of a Cuban boat that twelve wouldbe refugees had hijacked.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was also the interception of a Cuban boat that twelve wouldbe refugees had hijacked.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was also the interception of a Cuban boat that twelve wouldbe refugees had hijacked.
